author: Gy7479
body:
Well you create an account with them, then open a BTC or Eth wallet and send your crypto using the wallet adress (Bitcoin to Bitcoin, Eth to Eth). You have one free withdrawal per month, no length terms. Blockfi is only lending to institutions. Please take the time to read their whole website and FAQ, and take the time to read about sending and receiving cryptos, gas fees (transfer fees that you pay for every transaction), etc. I treat my cryptos like my stocks: long term hodler, passive income, aiming for 5% in cryptos for my portfolio. Mainly Btc and Eth, will add a few smaller coins eventually. 

As usual, not your keys not your coins warning.

author: TheRootOfMostEvil
body: The keys to financial independence are meme stocks and cryptos. 🔑🔑
